function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High volume of migration flows leading to international spread of pandemic","Impact":"Rapid and widespread transmission of contagious diseases across borders","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and screening at borders","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, border control technologies","People":"Migrants, international travelers, border control authorities","Owner":"Government, border control authorities"},{"Description":"High urbanization rate and population density leading to rapid disease diffusion in cities","Impact":"Increased likelihood of rapid disease transmission within densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, increase healthcare resources in urban areas, and monitor urban population movement","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, urban mobility analytics, healthcare infrastructure","People":"Urban residents, city planners, healthcare providers","Owner":"Local government, city planners, healthcare organizations"}]}
